settings.title: Settings

appearance.title: Appearance
appearance.description: Customize the appearance of the application.

uiLanguage.label: Interface Language
uiLanguage.description: Choose the language for the application interface.

aiLanguage.label: AI Interaction Language
aiLanguage.description: Choose the language for interacting with the AI assistant.

settings.freeUserPremiumFeature: This feature is only available for paid users. Please upgrade your account to access premium AI modes.
settings.freeUserPremiumFeatureChat: Upgrade to Premium to access 'Creative' and 'Precise' modes.

aiMode.label: Default AI Mode
aiMode.description: Choose the behavior for AI interactions.
aiMode.freeUserLimitation: ('Creative' and 'Precise' modes only for paid users)
aiMode.chatAiSettingsDescription: Configure AI for daily conversations and task suggestions.

researchModel.label: Research Model
researchModel.description: Choose the AI model for 'Deep Research' functionality.
researchModel.researchDescription: Provides factual answers with citations and maximum depth.
researchModel.instructionDescription: Follows instructions precisely and is ideal for directed tasks.
researchModel.creativeDescription: Offers innovative ideas and original perspectives with enhanced creativity.
researchModel.perplexitySonarDescription: Uses Perplexity Sonar for in-depth answers with up-to-date web data and citations.
researchModel.gpt4oMiniDescription: Uses GPT-4o Mini for quick, reliable answers based on previous training.

chatModel.label: Chat Model Provider
chatModel.description: Choose which model is used for standard chat functionality.
chatModel.perplexitySonarDescription: Uses Perplexity Sonar for comprehensive and contextual responses.
chatModel.gpt4oMiniDescription: Uses GPT-4o Mini for efficient and balanced responses (default).

aiModelConfig.drawerDescription: Adjust settings for the AI models.
aiModelConfig.defaultModelDescription: Select the default AI model for general use. Paid users can choose more advanced options via Developer Mode.
aiModelConfig.systemPromptPlaceholder: You are an AI assistant that helps with tasks...
aiModelConfig.systemPromptDefaultValue: You are a helpful AI assistant that helps users manage and understand their tasks.

desktopLayout.label: Interface Layout (Desktop)
desktopLayout.description: Choose the default arrangement for the task detail and chat window on desktop.

aiLanguageChanged.toDutch: AI language has been changed to Dutch
aiLanguageChanged.toEnglish: AI language has been changed to English

deactivateUser.description: This action can be undone by reactivating the user.

activateUser.title: Are you sure you want to activate {{userName}}?

addUserDialog.title: Add New User
addUserDialog.description: Enter the details to create a new user.

deleteUserConfirmation.title: Delete User?
deleteUserConfirmation.description: Are you sure you want to delete user {{email}}? This action cannot be undone and will permanently delete the user and all associated data.

newTaskDialog.title: New Task
newTaskDialog.description: Describe what you want to do, and let AI fill in the details.

contactPage.title: Contact Us
contactPage.description: Have a question, suggestion, or found a bug? Let us know!
contactPage.messagePlaceholder: Describe your question, suggestion, or bug as clearly as possible...

notLoggedIn.title: Not logged in
notLoggedIn.description: Please log in to send a message.

messageSent.title: Message Sent
messageSent.description: Thanks for your feedback! We will look into it as soon as possible.

sendFailed.title: Send Failed
sendFailed.defaultError: Could not send the message. Please try again later.

supportPage.paragraph1: Do you have questions or are you experiencing problems with OrgaMaster AI? Contact our support team.
supportPage.paragraph2a: You can reach us via email at:
supportPage.paragraph3: We strive to answer your questions as quickly as possible.
